name: Super Blast
description:
Super Blast is an action-packed fun arcade shooter with super easy game control.

You are playing with a trigger-happy robot, who is cleaning up the universe from creepy monsters.

Beware, don’t let any monsters pass you!

Collect a variety of weapons on your flight through the Galaxy. Newer and better weapons will make your job a little easier.

If you are under pressure fighting off enemies, just tap the screen and resolve the matter with an ultimate Super Blast.

*** Now also available: Super Blast 2! ***
